actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the awarding of attorneys' fees to prevailing plaintiffs in actions brought under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.

summary.text: Amends the National Environmental Policy Act to authorize any case arising under such Act to award reasonable attorneys' fees to a prevailing plaintiff.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the awarding of attorneys' fees to prevailing plaintiffs in actions brought under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.
